meanings.sent1: The happy child is having a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She is having a big house.
meanings.sent3: The cat is having a fluffy tail.
meanings.sent4: The garden is having colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The delicious cake is having a cherry on top.

meanings.sent1: They are having a fun time at the park.
meanings.sent2: He is having a headache from the loud noise.
meanings.sent3: The students are having a challenging test.
meanings.sent4: She is having a dream about flying.
meanings.sent5: The family is having a wonderful vacation.

meanings.definition: Showing a particular characteristic or quality
meanings.sent1: The smiling girl is having a positive attitude.
meanings.sent2: The old tree is having strong roots.
meanings.sent3: The colorful painting is having a vibrant look.
meanings.sent4: The fast car is having a sleek design.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight is having a courageous heart.
